channel.title: AncientBlitz Development | Need experienced programmer's
channel.description:
AncientBlitz is a two day old server so far, I've been working on it for the past two weeks. I have encountered some bug's I'm in need of help with, so I've decided just to get someone by my side. I have invited a few of my friends and every one of them has loved the server, and stayed. Me and my friend have been working side by side the past 3 years, he hosts, I program. Between us we have had a steady 30-40 players each server. But, this server is different, we want to get big, so I want one other experienced Java Programmer, this is a PI base. For some of the members that like media to see what they will be working with I'll provide some, also I would like to state, this server is loading 600+ cache some item's are 700+. The overall combat is pretty flawless, other then one bug. I would enjoy to have someone who will be dedicated, at least one straight hour a day. The next four days, I'm only fixing bugs, after that its all updates and occasional bugs. Well enough of this, I'll show you some pictures. Credit's to the creator of this base will be below.
[center]Media:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/lC4O5.png[/img]
Credits: Creator of Vistex V2 [/center]
[center]Applications:[/center]
[code]Website Programmer: Name: Years of Experience: Msn/Skype(you can PM me): Any website's of yours(PM me): Extra information: [/code]
[code]Client/Server sided(Choose one or both): Name: Years of experience: Msn/Skype(you can PM it): Any release's or current work: Extra information: [/code]
Notice - This thread will be worked on, its late at night and I wanted to get it up tonight to get some people hopefully by tomorrow. I will be doing loads of updates this weekend, but this week is bug fixes so you won't really notice any changes unless your playing the server. Please don't tell me I leeched, its still in development I'm not finished...
